## Description {#details}

Debug lexical block.

Uses the SubclassData1 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/metadata">Metadata</a> slot.

Definition at line 2462 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfometadata-h">DebugInfoMetadata.h</a>.
